website_summaries.verdict: Easy gloves to put on and wear, while providing a high level of wrist support with a tight fit.
pros: Padded areas in the knuckle and wrist areas supported with a gel lining for comfort and for shock dissipation
Air ventilation in the palm area will keep your hands feeling cooler
Fits tightly, yet these gloves are not uncomfortable to wear for long periods of time
Offered in five different color combination and glove weight options
cons: Stitching in stress areas on the glove may give out over time

customer_reviews.title: For the true face-puncher
customer_reviews.text: I punched faces, bags, and air with these gloves, sometimes while also being punched, and everyone seemed pretty satisfied with the results. Bottom line: Durable, snug, affordable. And good for punching faces.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Mar

customer_reviews.title: These are probably the most Amazing gloves for the price point I have run across.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best I have used at this price point. They will hold up to use. 1. Great wrist closure. 2. Plenty of knuckle protection. 3. "new car smell" only lasts a couple of workouts. 4. Comfortable to put on and hammer out a training session. One thing to note: I have the 14 oz. and my hands are medium sized, the thumb enclosure is exactly at the tip of my thumb. If I had large hands I don't think these would fit. Go for the 16 oz. if you have larger hands.
customer_reviews.author: Cale

customer_reviews.title: Gloves are fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I've had Everlast, Title, Venum and Rival. Figured I would give RDX a try because I've heard great things. I'm NOT disappointed at all. Gloves are very comfortable with great padding but not too much padding where it feels like you're punching with a pillow. They are also the most inexpensive gloves I have bought. My Rival R11 gloves were amazing. The only difference is I can buy 3 of these for every 1 pair of the Rival gloves and these are just as good. Very happy so far and can't wait until they are truly broken in. That's when the fun really starts.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot speak to how they hold up over time, but out of the package the gloves look great and provide plenty of padding after using for an initial run on the heavy bag. I hope there are no issues in regards to quality, as they seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: SWILLY

customer_reviews.title: Protect your hands and look good doing it
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the quality of these gloves. The durability of the inner foam is outstanding, providing more than adequate support of the wrist and hand. I have used these for boxing and kickboxing training and ,unlike the gloves I borrow from the gym, my hands NEVER hurt from soreness after training. I would highly recommend these for any skill level. Not to mention they are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great glove for the mitts and the heavy bag. I only ordered the 12oz so I don't spar with them but I am sure they would work well in that scenario as well. I also ordered a pair (in pink) for my wife and she loves her gloves as well. I will get some 16oz and use them to spar after I break them in and will write another review on that. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Okay but too big
customer_reviews.text: Got these in the mail, tried them on, wow, this is a big pair of gloves, the cuffs reaching half way on my arms, and there are plenty of room in the palm area which is not ideal for punching bag exercises. My hands are on the skinny side and I definitely do not see my hands in these. Seems nicely built for its price, can smell leather in them. But I’d go for Rival as recommended by the gym owner.
customer_reviews.author: babyju

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are cheap and flimsy. RDX makes good products. Love their shin guards. When I got these gloves in thought they would be great for bag work. As a guy who trains Muay Thai. These are just to long and bulky. They felt cheap and flimsy. Maybe I got a bad set, I don’t know. Like I said, RDX is a pretty good brand and puts some good stuff on the market. For me, if these are going to be your main gloves, look else where. Fairtex or Top King would be a good place to look.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Do don’t buy for heavy bag work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy for hitting a heavy bag!!! I bought these for a boxing class because of the reviews. I used them for less than 2 weeks and my left knuckle on my jab hand was swollen so bad I could not even touch it. I tried different hand wraps and nothing helped. I wish I could return them they were such a disappointment. Please get a good pair of boxing gloves and save yourself from an injury.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moss

customer_reviews.title: These Seem Like a Much More Expensive Glove
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them once so far, so I left the durability at 3 stars, and will update that as I get more use. Initial impression (not being familiar with RDX) was very surprised at how well made these things look, and feel. Especially how they feel. Just trying these things on, they felt great. I've never felt anything like it before. I didn't want to take them off. It was like your hands were being swaddled. The wrist support is better than any other glove I've tried, and without feeling restrictive in any way. Overall, I am really impressed with these gloves. Top of the line glove for cheap money.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gloves
customer_reviews.text: My spouse has been thrilled with these. The difference a punch can make with the right gloves is amazing. The fit is snug, though you'll be able to fit your handwraps in well, especially by your second session. They look great in gold and white. They're breathable and balanced, and can handle those long pad or bag sessions well. The padding is great, and your hands, knuckles, and wrist will be well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Michelena

customer_reviews.title: You can tell the quality is better then cheaper gloves I have had before
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for a few months, and I do heavy bag work 1-2 times a week. The padding in these gloves remains firm and has a solid feel to it. You can tell the quality is better then cheaper gloves I have had before. I use a mixture of white vinegar and water to clean them inside and there is absolutely no odor. I don't wrap my hands, but then again, I don't box as often as others do. Overall I am very happy with these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Rabinovich

customer_reviews.title: A little tight, but good gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these gloves for the last month to prolong the life of my Title gloves that I also use throughout the week. I like the gel for impact and the support at the wrist, however I have large hands and the fit is a bit tight. I don't think I would be able to get these gloves over my hands if they were wrapped, whereas the Title gloves have plenty of room for this if necessary. After a month's worth of sparring, hitting mitts and bags (2 days per week) the gloves have held up well and have not given me any issues.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Too big, but would have been great if smaller
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I had to return these because they were too big. If you have a large hand and long fingers, these gloves will work GREAT for you. I'm 5'5" and have pretty thick hands for a woman (size 10 ring), and there was still a ton of room around my fingers even with my gel wraps underneath. I was so sad that they were so big because they were great quality and had a ton of padding. They just would have moved around too much when hitting the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Liz B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy on/off with solid Velcro that does ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy on/off with solid Velcro that does not slip. Used these about a dozen times now and they look to be well made, no cheap stuff here. I have bought others that rip or separate at seams almost right away and these gloves are not that. Defiantly recommend for anyone using at home for working a heavy bag. No need to spend $200 on competitors when these are available.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: 16 oz Fit Perfect, Good Cushion for Heavy Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought these along with the speed wraps for heavy bag work. The speed wraps fit underneath these gloves (16oz at least, can’t speak to other sizes). Used several times at this point and they seem very durable, comfortable and would absolutely purchase again. I’ve had other sets of gloves in the past and these have worked the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jaba

customer_reviews.title: Helping improve my punches
customer_reviews.text: So far I used my RDX Ego Boxing Gloves for 3 Muay Thai training sessions. I find they fit tighter and support my wrists far better than my old gloves that were more expensive They help correct a tendency I have to roll my wrist with hooks and uppercuts when I tire practicing combinations or sparring. The wrist strap and velcro are stronger than the old gloves so I expect they'll hold up long enough to justify buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Persistent Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and I got complimets on them in the gym. I'm a woman with hands a little on the bigger side and they feel quite tight on my hands. Don't know how much breaking in they'd require to feel comfortable for man hands. But I would recommend them. They feel high quality, very supportive and look sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: A great glove for pad work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves as a replacement for a pair of Title gloves that finally wore out. These gloves look great, are comfortable, the leather and stitching is high quality, and they offer good protection when hitting the heavy bag. I use these gloves for my 9 Round workouts 5-6 times a week and would definitely buy again. The only issue I've had is they do fit a little tight with hand wraps on, but they appear to be stretching out over time. The best glove I've found for under $50.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bright

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pair of gloves
customer_reviews.text: WOW. Very high quality pair of boxing gloves. It's been awhile since I bought a pair. These are fantastic. Excellent quality and padding. Zero defect in material or stitching. I'm tempted to buy another pair for a spare.
customer_reviews.author: YoungTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: These gloves fit a lot better than the ones that the gym were selling in ...
customer_reviews.text: I started going to boxing and kickboxing classes over a year ago. When I signed my contract I got free gloves and wraps but after about a year the seams started to split and the gloves were looking worn out. After reading several reviews online I purchased a size 14 oz of the RDX gloves. These gloves fit a lot better than the ones that the gym were selling in addition to feeling like I have more control. I chose gel because of their durability and additional padding strength. I would recommend these gloves to anyone that does bag training. I'm not a fighter so I wouldn't know if they are appropriate for sparing or not.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora

customer_reviews.title: so many problems.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. The inner lining is coming off and bunches up OUT OF THE BOX NEW! The gloves are way tight on my thumb and its uncomfortable. Returing this right away.. Avoid this brand because i bought shin pad with issues as well.
customer_reviews.author: KenGsaur

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend so he could practice sparring with his son. His background is MMA fighting. I him to give the gloves a review and he said, “ they are good quality, durable, very comfortable and safe”.. Tim if he would purchase them again and he said, “ yes, but we probably won’t have to because these will last a very long time“! Sincerely, Kerri Varney MSN, APRN
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Varney

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves for women!
customer_reviews.text: While these gloves have a snug hand compartment that fits narrower hands, they don't do well for shorter fingers. The cuffs are also quite long, so if you're just slim, but not short, these gloves would probably work well for you. Good padding and seem to be well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wiens

customer_reviews.title: I have been having a hard time finding a good pair of gloves
customer_reviews.text: I got these yesterday and went to Sanshou later that evening. These gloves are like pouring warm syrup on pancakes! I love the feel. I still have to break them in, but you know that part of it. I was so impressed that I bought the shin guards too. 🔥
customer_reviews.author: Love Life Light

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Happy with these gloves. I bought the red and white version. Well worth the money. Just started boxing so I’m a newby and this is my first pair of gloves so I don’t have anything to compare them to except the loaners at the gym. But so far, I really like them. I get compliments from the trainers at the gym too! I would recommend them. You’ll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: I have been doing boxing/kickboxing classes for about a year ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing boxing/kickboxing classes for about a year, and decided to move from regular Everlast gloves to these. After about a month of using these my right hand middle knuckle was swollen and hurt on impact. After switching back to my Everlast gloves I noticed how stiff the padding was around the knuckles (this is with 180" wraps). Since switching back to my old Everlast gloves I haven't had any issues with knuckle pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Are holding up just fine so far.
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and protect the skin on my knuckles and keep my wrists straight so I won't injure them. I don't do any heavy duty boxing or anything, but more of an aerobic exercise using a Century standalone punching bag. I works great for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: St8kout

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove, good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves for working out. A bit snug, but can still fit my hand when fully wrapped, and I have pretty big hands. Have held up to about 2 months of 3x a week workouts so far without issue.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Borchers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gloves, just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves, great for hitting the heavy bag. I was looking for a good pair with a nice pop to them and these are it. They break in quickly and it feels great to hit the bag with them unlike other gloves that are top cushiony making the impact seem light... anyhow, love these!
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Quality gloves
customer_reviews.text: I have put these gloves through 4 workouts and they hold up very well. First thing that catches you, is how sharp they look. They fit very well. I ordered the 16oz and they don't feel heavy. The protection in the hands and wrist is great! At less than $50, this is a phenomenal pair of gloves.
customer_reviews.author: prwrestler

customer_reviews.title: But fresh out the box they look and feel great. Little snug and I don't have big hands
customer_reviews.text: I've only done a few rounds of heavy bag work so I can't say much. But fresh out the box they look and feel great. Little snug and I don't have big hands. These feel so much better then my Everlast protex2 gloves. More secure around back of hand and wrist.
customer_reviews.author: milj15

customer_reviews.title: good gloves for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are good gloves for the price, the fit is nice (I'm about 180#) and the design is as advertised, They work for bag work and sparring. However, I wish the wrist straps would not have any left over when I bind them tight-- when I do, there is some of the strap left hanging over the velcro and I'm worried I'll scratch someone's eye with it. I also feel more impact with these 16ozers on my wrists than my Title 13oz gloves on the bag. The knuckle impact is fine though. It is too soon to tell anything about the interior lining.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Jacques

customer_reviews.title: RDX Boxing Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 14oz gloves in the blue color. They take awhile to actually break in, but now they’re so comfortable! My old gloves had such little padding that I my knuckles would bleed. These gloves have tons of padding but not so much that it takes away from punches. Love this brand and I will continue to buy these when I need new gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi B.

customer_reviews.title: ... use the 16 oz as bag gloves because i like plenty of cushion and some space for my wrapped ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the 16 oz as bag gloves because i like plenty of cushion and some space for my wrapped hands, w my 16 oz, it's very comfortable, provides plenty of protection for your hands, not sure how this will hold up as bag gloves, i will update when i have time, i think the 16oz are ok for sparring too.
customer_reviews.author: aaa

customer_reviews.title: Gloves fit well and are comfortable, m
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit well and are comfortable,m. Only down fall is that there is not enough cushion even with wraps on you will still feel it to some extent.
customer_reviews.author: John Kuhlmeier

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: 4 Stars, because it retains smell. But overall good quality gloves. (The smell is not bad if you air out the gloves however a little does linger). Good price for its quality
customer_reviews.author: Manito

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Never realized the difference between cheaper gloves till I bought these. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: manutd

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Gloves
customer_reviews.text: The more I use these the more I like them. Had some tingling in my hands the first few times I used them which almost made me return them. Worked through it and they seem to be getting better. Definitely provide additional wrist support and would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: David Plunkett

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I like these gloves the best of the gloves i purchased. I also bought the RDX Cow Hide Leather Gel Boxing Glove Punching... and i liked these, the RDX Ego Boxing gloves better.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great boxing gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gloves! Great wrist support and made with genuine leather. As soon as you open the package you realize how well made these gloves are. If you are on the fence of buying these, I assure you these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Joker

customer_reviews.title: Better than Everlast
customer_reviews.text: I have used a variety of gloves when it comes to sparring and heavy bags. These are heavy bag gloves. i like them more than my original pair of main event gloves and much more comfortable than Everlast but a second to the Venum brand i use for sparring and heavybag work. The only issue i have is they are tight when you have your wraps on. Lots of padding which seems like its a solid pad and not the shredded kind other gloves use. Overall i do like them.
customer_reviews.author: gamer360

customer_reviews.title: One Punch Man
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never hit the heavy bag before with gloves, have done Taekwondoe and wrestling so wanted to work on my striking. This is an excellent glove for a beginner like me. No loose threads, and feels real sturdy. After 3 months of heavy use it still looks brand new, none of the design has come off which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Much better than other gloves that I have tried!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as an upgrade from some cheap gloves that I got with my heavy bag purchase. These are much better in many different ways. The quality is amazing, the fit is perfect, the punch absorption really helps make a workout last longer, etc. Would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small hands!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5ft 2inches 133 lb woman with small hands. I got the 14oz one and it is snug fit for my small hands. It was very difficult for me to get gloves that would fit my small hands and in which they won’t swim around even with a wraps.This is the perfect one where my hands donot look like hulk’s hands and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic protection AND force
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves! I bought these gloves twice- once a while back just to try and again recently after a knuckle injury caused by a pair of gloves from Ringside that didn't have the same level of knuckle protection. These have always been reliable and protective without sacrificing impact or force in mitts/bagwork/sparring. Been boxing for a long time and went through many pairs of gloves- trust me, these gloves are GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful glove
customer_reviews.text: These are nice sparring/ shadow boxing gloves. They feel super light (12oz), comfortable and sturdy. Fun gloves to use, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Rieger

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for MMA / Krav sparring
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for MMA / Krav sparring. Paint is very durable, doesn't fade or scratch. Straps are secure and stay fastened in clinch. The interior is pleasant on your hands, and the exterior is equally pleasant on your opponent's face.
customer_reviews.author: Styopa Semenukha

customer_reviews.title: these are like the Cadillac of gloves while they're all using the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased three pairs of these (one for me and one for each of my daughters). Compared to the other gloves being used in our class, these are like the Cadillac of gloves while they're all using the equivalent of a Geo Metro! Very comfortable and we all love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rdx is the vest
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boxing gloves i own i have broken my hands many times with other gloves the technology they made these gloves out of leave me able to train hard and long with no pull of my punches made with amazing quality
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Wrist support
customer_reviews.text: Great wrist support. Have more expensive gloves and they don’t compare.
customer_reviews.author: craig klamento

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who is in college. He liked the gloves except it fit too tight, he said he could not make a proper fist. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: My first pair of boxing gloves
customer_reviews.text: this is my first pair of boxing gloves,so I may have should have gotten larger ones,i got the 14 ozs ones,but they give good support when hitting with full power.quality is very good,they should last me a life time,look are great, the leather and stitching and color are very good.......they arrived ahead of schedule,so all in all im happy...........
customer_reviews.author: steve smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Glove
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gloves. Very soft leather on the outside and then the inside is actually like a fabric material (which is the only downfall, in my opinion) so the inside gets pretty warm rather quickly. Good protection for the hands while throwing and blocking punches. Tight around the wrist to there is good wrist support. Most likely will be tight when you first put them on (mine were) but wrap up and get to practicing and they'll break in. Good gloves, I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Need time to break it. It was hurting from the first few sessions. after that, is a beast now
customer_reviews.author: LoongZai

customer_reviews.title: ... 190lbs muscular build I bought a 14oz pair I love them. They are very comfortable and feel great ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5ft9 190lbs muscular build I bought a 14oz pair I love them. They are very comfortable and feel great when hitting the heavy bag. Don't need much breaking in. Only thing is I usually wear 14-16oz gloves and these 14oz gloves ran a lot bigger then 14oz title or everlast gloves. Still fit great and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lacerra

customer_reviews.title: Look great, feel good
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of gloves. They fit my hands well. I use them 4 days a week, up to 2 hours/ workout and so far held up well. Gloves initially fit nice and tight, but do tend to get looser, but are wearing well, and the looser fit is not too loose. I tend not to wrap my hands, so this may be the reason.
customer_reviews.author: DKM

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves for the price - feel and look awesome, however, only 3-4 months into training of 4 times a week average, cover on the inner side of fingers on the right glove started falling apart. Other than that can't say anything bad about them.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for over a year, still in great shape. No fading on the colors or designs. Very protective. Used almost daily. Padding still in correct places
customer_reviews.author: Olivia T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The gloves provide a tight fit and solid support for heavy bag work.
customer_reviews.author: Pied Piper

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking durable gloves!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOve these gloves. Bought them for 16 year old nephew. I was curious about the brand but they are NICE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Solid Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and has good supports. Wish it came in grey or black as a main color
customer_reviews.author: 5everyung

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pair of gloves...usually wear and recommend to wear wraps but haven’t at times with these. Excellent fit, pure protection and comfort level is awesome. Highly recommend! Got em in white and they look cool and nasty!!!
customer_reviews.author: MrPurple

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter gloves for my 15 yr old beginner kick boxer!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Styles

customer_reviews.title: Is quality product thanks
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I am very happy with this thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old grandson said the gloves were great.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Gutfreund

customer_reviews.title: Tooo tight , cuts and blisters from using them
customer_reviews.text: I've been fighting for several years using all different kinds of gloves but this is the first pair that is so tight it cut my hands from using them , had them a week so far boxed couple of hours with them maybe they will loosen up or I will by a pair from a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Great Gloves for the $$. Got these for Heavy Bag Workouts,I've used a few time now. I wear Medium Bike/Ski Gloves etc. These work with the Gel Padded Wraps I purchased as well. Snug but fit, and support my wrists nicely. Together they work great and I can smash the bag without hand pain. Highly recommend for this type of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These seem better made, have more cushion and fit better than ...
customer_reviews.text: Decided to spend a little more than I did on my last pair of gloves. It was definitely worth it. These seem better made, have more cushion and fit better than the cheaper Everlast gloves. Glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bish

customer_reviews.title: Look good, feel good
customer_reviews.text: Look good, feel good, work well. I am not a huge fan of big gloves, I prefer the small gl
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and get for training
customer_reviews.text: Husband ia starting Muay Thai and they worked great! His coach really loved the colors (green/white)! Great item that isn't outrageously priced for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Remysmom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Muy Thai boxing gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son as a gift, and we were so pleased at the quality and appearance of these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny M.

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. They provide great protection, are very durable, and are well-made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best glove around for the price
customer_reviews.text: The leather and stitching used is very good quality. Other people I train with were really impressed and thought my gloves felt and looked really good. Over all really happy with my purchase. A whole lot better than the 50 dollar venom gloves they have.
customer_reviews.author: omar lopez

customer_reviews.title: Second pair and counting
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of RDX boxing gloves. When my first pair started to get a little beat up themselves I decided to buy a new pair at the near by big box sports store. They didn't carry RDX so I settled for a popular name brand. The next morning in the gym was all it took for me to get back on my computer and order a new pair of RDX 's. Thank you Amazon prime. Two days later I'm back in the gym sparring with the real thing. These are quality gloves and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffafa

customer_reviews.title: Very good gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely will recommend these gloves to anybody that is getting into boxing or mma.
customer_reviews.author: Vu Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for gym or home use.
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for hitting the bag at home or taking to the gym. Much better and more slim than the gloves I previously was using.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves. I take striking classes at an MMA gym for fun and these are amazing compared to the cheap ones I was using before.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine R Kozloski

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are legit. I train with them 6 to7 days a week for a few hours at a time. They really protect your hands and wrist. They are holding up well with bag, mitt work, and hard sparring
customer_reviews.author: Robert Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This gloves are excellent very comfortable I been using than 6 days a week for 6 weeks and they still like new.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Maingon

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit with great wrist support!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are incredible. Wrist support is great which is a must because I've had carpal tunnel surgery already. They're so tight I can't wear grips, but the wrist supports in the gloves themselves make them unnecessary. I use the 16oz size and they're still snug on my hands (I'm a woman).
customer_reviews.author: Kickboxing mom

customer_reviews.title: Great leather 16oz gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and very good fitting boxing gloves. I use them for heavy bag training.
customer_reviews.author: Leo M

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GLOVES
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are awesome! I've had them for about a week now and they are great gloves to use and train with. They feel very high quality and are pretty breathable. I weigh around 150lbs and I'm about 5' 11, I bought the 14 oz gloves and they work great! I would definitely recommend buying these gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves! They are perfect for my boxing classes! They were a little snug to begin with but they have stretched just enough with continued use. They are well made. Well worth the purchase. I highly recommend. I love the colors, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good, quality gloves
customer_reviews.text: Happy with these gloves. Wear well and protect your hands from heavy hits on the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Pair for the price
customer_reviews.text: The thumb and rest of the fingers grip is a bit weird. Catching with this gloves is not comfortable. I keep having to constantly adjust my grip. Punching bag workout is good. Good padding and protection, but the thumb feels weird.
customer_reviews.author: marco_ym1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. They are great for hitting the heavy bag and i like the colors on the gloves
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money, great fun and joy  for my son
customer_reviews.text: My son is 14 with big hands at 130 pounds and loves to use a punching bag in the basement. He had outgrown smaller gloves and loves the feel of these. He even brought them on vacation because he liked wearing them. Ha.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Sore Knuckles/Fingers
customer_reviews.text: These gloves take a lot of power to grip, causing sore fingers (from stretching and straining, impact padding is fine) in a really short amount of time. I’ve used other gloves with no problem, but these were just an overall bad fit. A couple friends tried them out as well and had the same complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Good Bill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginner gloves
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, feels great and is a great quality no rips or tears after an intense usage
customer_reviews.author: Irakli Kavtaradze

customer_reviews.title: Love.  Love.  Love!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are comfortable, beautiful, and functional. I absolutely love them! Zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for the money!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are a great deal for the price. Arguably there are better gloves out there but these aren't bad at all. I like that they have good wrist support so I can hit the bag hard. My only complaint is the thumb is a bit tight. Other than that definitely worth the money. I got 16 Oz gloves in blue. The quality is superb for the price point. Definitely recommend these, especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Abel

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: My first set of RDX gloves had a small issue, the company quickly reached out to me to offer me a replacement. I loved their customer service. The gloves provide great support for my wrist and are flexible enough to use for Muay Thai, Cardio Kickboxing, and Tae Kwon Do point sparring.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Top gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a while ago and just got my second pair after moving. Love the wrist support on these. Top value for $$. Came in 2 days despite not needing to arrive for two weeks. A++ Service, if I needed a new pair I would not hesitate to get these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... beginner glove they are defiantly worth it they are comfortable and help keep your knuckles hurting i weigh 185 ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these gloves when i first started boxing and for being a beginner glove they are defiantly worth it they are comfortable and help keep your knuckles hurting i weigh 185 and was using the 16oz, they were my bag and sparing gloves i never used them in a match
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The product was delivered very quickly and I started using them the next day. I am not a stand up fighter but love to use these for bag work. Glove construction is top notch and I am hoping that the velcro band can hold up for many sessions to come.
customer_reviews.author: Wai

customer_reviews.title: Great for hitting stuff
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality gloves. My son has used a few different brands, and these are excellent for their cost.
customer_reviews.author: Gio

customer_reviews.title: Son LOVES his gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son teaches a Boxfit class and these gloves are perfect for him. They fit snug and have great padding, RDX never lets us down!
customer_reviews.author: eluvsbooks

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of boxing gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of boxing gloves. Have a nice weight and feel to them. Keeps your wrists braced well and overall are comfortable while training.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Griffis

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair, I have green and gold. Love the fit and comfort for kickboxing. Not sure how to clean them inside but that's the same issue with all gloves. I get a lot of compliments on them from men and women. Awesome gloves.
customer_reviews.author: girlshopsalot

product_meta.title: RDX Boxing Gloves for Training Muay Thai Maya Hide Leather Mitts for Fighting, Kickboxing, Sparring EGO Gloves for Punch Bag, Focus Pads, Thai Pad, Grappling Dummy and Double End Ball Punching
feature_bullets: Maya Hide leather construction makes RDX boxing gloves stubbornly durable and long-lasting. Ego gloves stands undisputed victor of the all-inclusive, hard-hitting, training and working out. Material is resistant to cracks, tear or splits
Extra thick padding protects your hands and attached thumb. Highly dense padding is implacable for athletes indulged into Muay Thai, Kickboxing, and contact sports.
Extra-long Quick EZ Hook-and-Loop offers superior wrist-support and a comfortable fit. The strap allows for a bit more wrist movement, and keeps your wrists aligned while striking.
S.P.P technology provides natural airing and decreases sweat while you train. Perforated holes in the palm helps in shrinking unpleasant aroma and keeps your palms dry and comfortable.

Quadro-Dome technology is far too effective than the layered-foam conventional boxing gloves, this technology seeks to provide eventual protection. It assists in natural alignment when striking, maintains stable wrist and thumb position.
